title: New: Wildhoney – Becky’s Back
content:
With a stompingly dirty bassline that would have Sonic Youth gleefully rubbing their hands together, Becky’s Back, the debut single from Baltimore’s Wildhoney is three minutes of blisteringly hot rock and roll.

Tearing through the verses into the rip-roaring chorus of ‘let us not forget’, you’ll have it etched to the inside of your eardrums after a solitary listen. Taken from their first EP out on 20 October, this lead track is a promising sign of things to come.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
